#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int l=s.length();
        string t="";
        //cout<<s<<" "<<l<<endl;
        for(int i=(l/2)-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            t = t+s[i];
            //cout<<i<<" "<<t<<endl;
        }
        for(int i=l-1;i>=l/2;i--)
        {
            t=t+s[i];
        }
        cout<<t<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
